summary: Provides a collection of Django system checks that automatically audit project settings and middleware for common security misconfigurations, flagging weak secret keys, unsafe debug mode, missing allowed hosts, absent security middleware, missing HTTP security headers, and improper CSRF and session cookie configurations.
business_intent: Enable developers to detect and remediate insecure configuration choices early in the development cycle, promoting adherence to security best practices and reducing the risk of attacks such as XSS, clickjacking, CSRF, and session hijacking.
